summary: Comprehensive testing of SIGESC Sistema de Gestão Escolar. Backend APIs 85% passing (23/27 tests). All main pages load correctly. No critical errors found. Login, Dashboard, navigation, and data display working properly.

minor.issue: Returns 405 Method Not Allowed - endpoint requires academic_year parameter
Returns 404 - correct endpoint is /api/audit-logs or similar

issues: Shows 0 Alunos but student exists (likely filtered by Transferido status)
Quick access cards don't navigate directly - URL stays on /dashboard (navigation may use onClick but appears to work via URL)

critical_code_review_comments: All routes under /admin/* prefix - documented correctly in App.js
UPPERCASE migration appears complete - all names shown in CAPS
PWA Background Sync errors are non-critical (service worker not available in preview environment)
context_for_next_testing_agent: System is stable. Test data: 1 School (ESCOLA TESTE MULTISSERIADA - Inativa), 1 Class (TURMA MULTI 1-2-3 - 2026 - Multi 1º-5º), 1 Student (ALUNO TESTE ATUALIZADO - Transferido status, no class assigned), 3 Users, 1 Staff. Avisos page is at /avisos not /admin/announcements. All admin routes use /admin/* prefix.

pages_tested.login: PASS - Login form working, redirects to dashboard
pages_tested.dashboard: PASS - Shows stats, quick access, admin menu
pages_tested.admin_classes: PASS - Lists classes with filter by school
pages_tested.admin_students: PASS - Lists students with search and filters
pages_tested.admin_users: PASS - Lists 3 users with edit/delete actions
pages_tested.admin_analytics: PASS - Analytics dashboard loads with charts
pages_tested.admin_diary_dashboard: PASS - Diary monitoring dashboard loads (0% completion)

data_observations.school: ESCOLA TESTE MULTISSERIADA - Status: Inativa, 0 alunos shown
data_observations.class: TURMA MULTI 1-2-3 - Year 2026, Multisseriada 1º-5º, No teachers, 0 students
data_observations.student: ALUNO TESTE ATUALIZADO - Status: Transferido, School assigned but no class
data_observations.users: 3 users: GUTENBERG BARROSO (admin), SEMED - VISUALIZAÇÃO (SEMED), RICLEIDE DA SILVA GONÇALVES (Professor)
